welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Herouville-Saint-Clair, known for its charming architecture, delicious cuisine, and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in the city's unique culture and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Gatien Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Octeville Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Octeville Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
